==The brawl==
==The brawl==
â
[[Image:FIUUMHBrawl.PNG|400px|thumb|right|Timeline of the 2006 [[University of Miami]]-[[Florida International University]] brawl (left to right first row, followed by left to right second row): The extra point attempt before the brawl ensued; the brawl originating immediately after the extra point attempt; the brawl near its peak; the referee declaring ejections and 15-yard penalty on kickoff.]]
 
Throughout the game, players from both teams engaged in [[trash-talk]] and were increasingly physical. By the third quarter, officials had called seven penalties (six for FIU and one for Miami).<ref>[http://sports.espn.go.com/ncf/playbyplay?gameId=262872390&quarter=0 Miami-FIU Play-by-Play on ESPN]</ref>
